website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, stylish golf bag with a smaller size that makes it easier to carry and store.
pros: Allows for easier sorting of gear
Extremely lightweight materials that remain durable
Includes five zippered pockets to keep gear organized
One pocket is velour-lined for storing valuables
cons: Dividers are not full length, which causes club handles to become tangled

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: The bag is lightweight and fits everything you need to golf, the dark color stays nice even in extreme weather conditions.
customer_reviews.author: RoRo

customer_reviews.title: Light and lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very light and works great. Not sure how long it will last but it is worth the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag. I love the "cooler" that is built ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. I love the "cooler" that is built in. Holds lots of items.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fink

customer_reviews.title: Golf bag
customer_reviews.text: Like the colors roomy. Keep forgetting I have a new bag since I store my clubs at our club. The bag boys forget too
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice
customer_reviews.text: This golf bag is perfect! Lightweight, great pockets, the black doesn't show dirt, and the lace accent gives a feminine touch.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth McGorty

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to carry, just the right amount of pockets for stuff. Also like the club dividers
customer_reviews.author: Robert McElhany

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Feminine style
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Club dividers are fine and pockets are sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bag that doesn't show dirt which is especially important when going in and out bed of a truck.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with it - it even had the dividers and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with it - it even had the dividers and I could not tell from the pictures whether it would or not - nice and light weight
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag with roomy pockets and light weight. Very convenient. Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: LanAnn Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bag is light and very nice looking. Haven't used it yet; waiting for spring
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice print, adequate pocket storage, just perfect and extremely lightweight yet durable. Everything I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight with lots of zipper compartments. Great bag for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Aronson

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Bag
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, a lightweight bag with dividers, some pockets, and a club cover. Looks sharp too.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Golf bag
customer_reviews.text: The golf bag is light which is what I was looking for, and also it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Blatchford

customer_reviews.title: It's not a bad bag just not as described
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not as advertised on the amazon site. I ordered a color called deep sea blue and received a black and white bag. I contacted Amazon and they sent out a new bag and picked up the wrong bag. They were very helpful but Still the wrong bag delivered again, not blue but the same black and white bag. Also, it says it has 14 full length dividers. It absolutely does not. Divider sections are only on top of bag and go down approx 2 inches. It's not a bad bag just not as described.
customer_reviews.author: D.  O.

product_meta.title: Hot-Z 2017 Golf 2.5 Cart Bag, Ladies Lace
product_meta.description: The Hot Z Golf 2.5 bag is much more than just an incredible priced bag, it has all the features you need in a lightweight cart bag, including including a 9" top with 14-way full length dividers, five zipper pockets, valuables pocket, two easy lift handles, padded carry strap, pen sleeve, scorecard sleeve, rain hood and so much more! Features: 9 inch 14-­way graphite friendly separator top 5 zippered pockets including a velour-­lined valuables pocket Padded rear position single carry strap w/ elastic band to secure strap Pen sleeve, towel ring w/ velcro glove attachment, umbrella and tee holder, scorecard sleeve, & rain hood cover Lightweight dobby nylon materials.
feature_bullets: 5 zippered pockets including a velour-­lined valuables pocket, Lightweight dobby nylon materials
